data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_005_0
data.text:
FOR ONE WILD ECSTATIC MOMENT
                I WOULD HAVE GONE ANYWHERE WITH HIM.....

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_005_2
data.text: GET AWAY FROM HER, TONY! SHE'S WITH ME!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_005_3
data.text: YOU'RE NOT HIS GIRL, EILEEN! TELL HIM!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_005_4
data.text: I'M SORRY, BART! I SHOULDN'T HAVE DONE THIS! I... I'D LIKE TO COME BACK... IF IT'S ALL RIGHT...

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_005_5
data.text: I... ALL RIGHT, EILEEN! IT'S ALL RIGHT!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_005_6
data.text: AFTER THAT NIGHT, TONY SEEMED TO VANISH FROM THE FACE OF THE EARTH. THAT FALL, I TOOK A JOB AS A SECRETARY, AND BART WENT OFF TO COLLEGE. HE WROTE OFTEN, AND I SAW HIM DURING VACA- TIONS AND ON OCCA- SIONAL WEEKENDS, WHEN HE COULD COME DOWN. A YEAR PASSED, AND THEN PART OF ANOTHER.. AND THEN ONE NIGHT.

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_005_8
data.text: HELLO, BABY! JUST THOUGHT I'D LOOK UP MY OLD FRIEND ... IT'S BEEN A LONG TIME... WONDERED HOW YOU WERE!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_005_9
data.text:
EVEN IF HE WAS A LITTLE
                DRUNK, I WAS GLAD TO SEE HIM. THE MINUTE HE CAME IN, THE
                OLD FEELING BEGAN TO COME BACK.....

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_005_10
data.text: YOU COULD HAVE FOUND OUT HOW I WAS, TONY! I'VE BEEN RIGHT HERE! WHAT ABOUT YOU? WHAT HAVE YOU BEEN DOING?

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_005_11
data.text: DON'T WORRY ABOUT OLD TONY, BABY... I CAN TAKE CARE OF MYSELF! LET'S TALK ABOUT YOU... YOU LOOK LIKE A MILLION BUCKS!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_005_12
data.text:
I'VE MISSED YOU, BABY! GIMME A
                LITTLE KISS... JUST FOR OL' TIMES' SAKE -- HOW
                ABOUT IT?

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_005_13
data.text: DON'T, TONY! PLEASE! I MEAN IT!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_005_14
data.text:
MY FEELINGS FOR HIM WERE THE
                SAME, BUT I DIDN'T WANT IT TO BE LIKE THIS!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_005_16
data.text: I MEAN IT, TONY! TAKE YOUR HANDS OFF ME!
